case_circumstances: John Doe #09-03 was found in wooded snowfield (body dump - covered by snow and branches).  Animal activity, arms not recovered.  White or Hispanic male, age 20-70 (dental: mid 20s to late 30s), 66.5" to 69", short brown hair (eyes undetermined).  Cause of death undetermined, but probably homicide.  Identity may only be established with dental X-rays and DNA (refer to CODIS #BK-03-000465).  Possible comparison with "smiling photographs" (showing teeth).
